list: 'A bag belt only?', he asked his balding brothers.
You'll have to plug your nose if you use this source of herbs.
Talk to Ali the Leaflet Dropper north of the Al Kharid mine.
Talk to Ambassador Spanfipple in the White Knights Castle.
Strength potions with red spiders' eggs? He is quite a herbalist.
Varrock is where I reside, not the land of the dead, but I am so old, I should be there instead. Let's hope your reward is as good as it says, just 1 gold one and you can have it read.
You will have to fly high where a sword cannot help you.
Killing a barbarian in Barbarian Village or Barbarian Outpost for a key to be able to search the chest in the Exam Centre
The dead, red dragon watches over this chest. He must really dig the view.
His bark is worse than his bite.
Speak to the bartender of the Blue Moon Inn in Varrock.
Talk to the bartender of the Rusty Anchor in Port Sarim.
Reflection is the weakness for these eyes of evil.
Reflection is the weakness for these eyes of evil.
Darkness wanders around me, but fills my mind with knowledge.
He knows just how easy it is to lose track of time.
Mix yellow with blue and add heat, make sure you bring protection.
I burn between heroes and legends.
This aviator is at the peak of his profession.
One of the sailors in Port Sarim is your next destination.
Talk to Charles in Port Piscarilius.
Talk to Charlie the Tramp in Varrock.
I would make a chemistry joke, but I'm afraid I wouldn't get a reaction.
Killing a chicken for a key to be able to search the drawers in the house in Seers' Village
In a town where everyone has perfect vision, seek some locked drawers in a house that sits opposite a workshop.
Talk to the cook in the Blue Moon Inn in Varrock.
In the place Duke Horacio calls home, talk to a man with a hat dropped by goblins.
With a name like that, you'd expect a little more than just a few scimitars.
You'll have to plug your nose if you use this source of herbs.
'See you in your dreams' said the vegetable man.
Speak to Donovan, the Family Handyman.
Speak to Doric, who lives north of Falador.
Talk to the mother of a basement dwelling son.
I watch the sea. I watch you fish. I watch your tree.
Speak to Ellis in Al Kharid.
This place sure is a mess.
Often sought out by scholars of histories past, find me where words of wisdom speak volumes.
A reck you say; let's pray there aren't any ghosts.
A reck you say; let's pray there aren't any ghosts.
I wouldn't wear this jean on my legs.
With drinks and dwarves I make my way, upon my head a glass will stay.
Generally speaking, his nose was very bent.
A general who sets a 'shining' example.
I live in a deserted crack collecting soles.
If a man carried my burden, he would break his back. I am not rich, but leave silver in my track. Speak to the keeper of my trail.
The doorman of the Warriors' Guild wishes to be impressed by how strong your equipment is.
'Small shoe.' Often found with rod on mushroom.
Mix yellow with blue and add heat, make sure you bring protection.
Killing an Ardougne guard for a key to be able to search the drawers on the of Jerico's house in East Ardougne
In a town where thieves steal from stalls, search for some drawers in the upstairs of a house near the bank.
Killing a guard dog at Handelmort Mansion for a key to be able to search the drawers on the of the pub north of Ardougne Castle
In a town where the guards are armed with maces, search the upstairs rooms of the Public House.
The King's magic shouldn't be wasted by me.
Talk to the barber in the Falador barber shop.
Identify the back of this over-acting brother. (He's a long way from home.)
Always walking around the castle grounds and somehow knows everyone's age.
Speak to Hans to solve the clue.
Snah? I feel all confused, like one of those cakes...
In the city where merchants are said to have lived, talk to a man with a splendid cape, but a hat dropped by goblins.
A demon's best friend holds the next step of this clue.
Surrounded by white walls and gems.
Killing a hill giant for a key to be able to search the crate on the of Osten's shop in Shayzien
A graceful man of many colours, his crates must be full of many delights.
Dobson is my last name, and with gardening I seek fame.
In a village of barbarians, I am the one who guards the village from up high.
Someone watching the fights in the Emir's Arena is your next destination.
Here, there are tears, but nobody is crying. Speak to the guardian and show off your alignment to balance.
I am the one who watches the giants. The giants in turn watch me. I watch with two while they watch with one. Come seek where I may be.
My life was spared but these voices remain, now guarding these iron gates is my bane.
Killing the King Black Dragon for a key to open the closed chest in the north-east corner of his lair
Scattered coins and gems fill the floor. The chest you seek is in the north east.
The doorman of the Warriors' Guild wishes to be impressed by how strong your equipment is.
Speak to the staff of Sinclair mansion.
She's small but can build both literally and figuratively.
Talk to a party-goer in Falador.
Where safe to speak, the man who offers the pouch of smallest size wishes to see your alignment.
Killing a man for a key to be able to search the chest on the of the house in Yanille
In a town where wizards are known to gather, search upstairs in a large house to the north.
Killing a market guard for a key to be able to search the drawers on the of the Lighthouse
Go to this building to be illuminated, and check the drawers while you are there.
Has no one told you it is rude to ask a lady her age?
Come have a cip with this great soot covered denizen.
Killing a monk for a key to be able to search the chest in the Varrock church
You'll need to look for a town with a central fountain. Look for a locked chest in the town's chapel.
Talk to Morgan in his house at Draynor Village.
Speak to Ned in Draynor Village.
The keeper of Melzars...Spare? Skeleton? Anar?
Killing Penda for a key to be able to search the drawers in Dunstan's house in north-east Burthorpe
Go to the village being attacked by trolls, search the drawers in one of the houses.
One of several rhyming brothers, in business attire with an obsession for paper work.
Killing a pirate in Brimhaven for a key to be able to search the drawers on the of a house in south-east Brimhaven
Search the upstairs drawers of a house in a village where pirates are known to have a good time.
Robin wishes to see your finest ranged equipment.
You might have to turn over a few stones to progress.
Speak to Rusty north of Falador.
Gold I see, yet gold I require. Give me 875 if death you desire.
Speak to Sarah at Falador farm.
Near the open desert I reside, to get past me you must abide. Go forward if you dare, for when you pass me, you'll be sweating by your hair.
Getting Shantay to send the player to the Port Sarim jail
Search the bucket in the Port Sarim jail.
Speak to the staff of Sinclair mansion.
Speak to Donovan, the Family Handyman.
Speak to Sir Kay in Camelot Castle.
Hopefully this set of armour will help you to keep surviving.
The Spirit tree in Tree Gnome Village
I have many arms but legs, I have just one, I have little family but my seed, You can grow on, I am not dead, yet I am but a spirit, and my power on your quests, you will earn the right to free it.
Talk to the Squire in the White Knights' castle in Falador.
You must be 100 to play with me.
Speak to the Lady of the Lake.
A dwarf, approaching death, but very much in the light.
Belladonna, my dear. If only I had gloves, then I could hold you at last.
I wonder how many bronze swords he has handed out.
You were 3 and I was the 6th. Come speak to me.
Come brave adventurer, your sense is on fire. If you talk to me, it's an old god you desire.
Let's hope you don't meet a watery death when you encounter this fiend.
Talk to Wayne at Wayne's Chains in Falador.
My name is like a tree, yet it is spelt with a 'g'. Come see the fur which is right near me.
Killing a wizard for a key to be able to search the drawers basement of the Wizards' Tower
A chisel and hammer reside in his home, strange for one of magic. Impress him with your magical equipment.
The magic of 4 colours, an early experience you could learn. The large beast caged up top, rages, as his demised kin's loot now returns.
Talk to Zeke in Al Kharid.
The mother of the reptilian sacrifice.
